sys_script.name: Update Vehicle Status

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_86d2e5244710311012c73d8a436d43b0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_759169_lva_vehicle_tracker</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Vehicle Status</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    // Create a new GlideRecord object for the Loaner Vehicle Catalog table
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_759169_lva_loaner_vehicle_catalog');

    // Log the current vehicle number
    gs.info('Vehicle number: ' + current.vehicle);

    // Use the get() method to retrieve the Vehicle record that has the 'number' field same as the 'vehicle' field on the current Vehicle Tracker record
    if (gr.get('number', current.vehicle)) {  

        // Log success of getting vehicle record
        gs.info('Successfully retrieved vehicle record: ' + gr.number);

        // If the Vehicle Status on the current Vehicle Tracker record is Pending Release, Out on Field, Returned for Inspection, or Sent for Servicing
        if (current.vehicle_status == 'pending release' || current.vehicle_status == 'out on field' || current.vehicle_status == 'returned for inspection' || current.vehicle_status == 'sent for servicing') {
            // Set the status of the Vehicle Catalog record to Unavailable
            gr.setValue('status', 'unavailable'); 
        }
        
        // Else, if the Vehicle Status on the current Vehicle Tracker record is Returned to Warehouse
        else if (current.vehicle_status == 'returned to warehouse') {
            // Set the status of the Vehicle Catalog record to Available
            gr.setValue('status', 'available');
        }
        
        // Else, if the Vehicle Status on the current Vehicle Tracker record is Decommissioned
        else if (current.vehicle_status == 'decommissioned') {
            // Set the status of the Vehicle Catalog record to Decommissioned
            gr.setValue('status', 'decommissioned');
        }
        
        // Update the Vehicle record in the database with the new status
        gr.update();

        // Log success of updating vehicle record
        gs.info('Successfully updated vehicle record: ' + gr.number);
    } else {
        // Log failure to get vehicle record
        gs.info('Failed to retrieve vehicle record with number: ' + current.vehicle);
    }
    
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-24 15:21:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>86d2e5244710311012c73d8a436d43b0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Vehicle Status</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_759169_lva">860fee114767211012c73d8a436d4334</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">860fee114767211012c73d8a436d4334</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_86d2e5244710311012c73d8a436d43b0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-24 21:36:22</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=86d2e5244710311012c73d8a436d43b0"/></record_update>
